title: Spacious 3BR Apartment in Hawally
description: Modern 3-bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms, large living area, and fully equipped kitchen. Located near shopping centers and schools. Features include central AC, built-in wardrobes, and covered parking.

title: Luxury Villa for Sale in Salwa
description: Exquisite 5-bedroom villa with private pool, landscaped garden, and high-end finishes. Perfect for large families seeking comfort and luxury. Features marble floors, designer kitchen, and maid's room.

title: Prime Commercial Shop in Salmiya
description: Prime commercial shop in bustling Salmiya area, perfect for retail or small businesses. High foot traffic location with excellent visibility. Includes storage area and customer parking.

title: Cozy Studio for Exchange in Jabriya
description: Cozy studio apartment perfect for singles or young professionals. Includes compact kitchen and private bathroom. Looking to exchange for a 1-bedroom apartment in similar area.

title: Investment Land Plot in Hawally
description: Large residential land plot available for immediate development. Great investment opportunity in developing area of Hawally. Suitable for apartment building or villa construction.

title: Modern 4BR House in Jabriya
description: Stylish 4-bedroom house with contemporary design and access to community amenities. Family-friendly neighborhood with parks and schools nearby. Features include garden, garage, and modern appliances.

title: Investment Building in Salmiya
description: Entire residential building for sale in prime Salmiya location. Includes 10 apartments and ground floor parking. Excellent investment opportunity with high rental yield potential.

title: Agricultural Farm in Wafra
description: Large agricultural farm with farmhouse, perfect for farming or quiet retreat. Fully equipped with irrigation system, storage facilities, and worker accommodation.

title: Beachfront Chalet in Khiran
description: Beautiful beachfront chalet with direct sea access, ideal for weekend getaways. Features include private beach area, BBQ facilities, and stunning sea views. Willing to exchange for city apartment.

title: Executive Office Space in Capital
description: Premium office space in Kuwait City's business district. Features include reception area, conference room, and modern amenities. Perfect for corporate headquarters or professional services.
